alert.note: Alert for Allen; Neosho; Wilson; Woodson (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 12 at 6:18AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Wilson, western Neosho, southeastern Woodson and southern Allen Counties through 645 AM CDT... At 618 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles west of Chanute, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chanute, Iola, Fredonia, Humboldt, Yates Center, La Harpe, Gas, Moran, Thayer, Altoona, Buffalo, Benedict, Earlton, Bassett, Petrolia, Rose, Chanute Airport, Iola Airport and Piqua. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
